flavorText: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

foreignData.flavorText: Darigaaz beschloß, daß sein Gegner als Waffe noch nützlicher sei.
foreignData.name: Rückschlag
foreignData.text: Tappe eine ungetappte Kreatur Deiner Wahl. Diese Kreatur fügt ihrem Beherrscher Schaden in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Darigaaz décida que son ennemi ferait une bonne arme.
foreignData.name: Contrecoup
foreignData.text: Engagez la créature dégagée ciblée. Cette créature inflige autant de blessures que sa force à son contrôleur.

name: Backlash
originalText: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

rulings.text: Being untapped is a targeting restriction. If the target is tapped before this spell resolves, then this spell doesn’t resolve.

text: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.
